news.title: Lunar New Years Sale!
news.body:
## Happy Lunar New Years!
We here at Astro Games are thrilled to announce a sale in celebration of the year of the Rabbit, take a look at all discounts available here
In game **La Tale**
- **30%** off dragon themed items
- **new** rabbit emblem
- **new** rabbit cloak
- **removed** all unnecessary predators

Looking forward to seeing everyone in game, we've seen more players than ever in the **US-east** region, so they're getting **double xp** weekend!

news.title: Zisk Plains Content Update
news.body:
## New Content Update

### New Area

- Zisk Plains
- Can be accessed through the portal in White Cole Canyon 5.

### New Scenario Quests

- Available to characters above Ascension level 1600.
- Only available to those who have completed the previous scenario quest: [The End of a Kingdom].

### New Instance Dungeons

- Void Star [* Lv. 1600+]
- Entry Count (Daily): 2
- 2-Man Time Attack Instance Dungeon

- Oblivion Lake [* Lv. 1700+]
- Entry Count (Daily): 1
- 6-Man Instance Dungeon

### New Monsters

### New NPCs

### New Equipment

- Void Brooch
- Rete's Red Badge (Badge 1)
- Rete's Blue Badge (Badge 3)
- Vigor Aurora Badge (Badge 5)
- Second Immortal Gaia Key
- Second Mythic Gaia Key
- Second Ethereal Gaia Key

### New Codex

- 23 Monster Illustrations
- 1 Title Illustrations

### New Title Codex

- 4 New title codex

### New Achievements

- 4 New achievements

### New Waypoint

- Eastland: Zisk Plains

### New Quests

- 12 Main-scenario quests
- 10 Sub-scenario quests
- 47 Normal quests
- 3 Repeatable quests
- 9 Daily quests
- 5 Random quests
- 5 Champion quests

### Guidebook Update

- New quests, items, and dungeons have been added.

### New Decorations

- Acorn Damage Skin
- Maple Damage Skin
- Bella Damage Skin
- Invisible Damage Skin
- Lunar Damage Skin

### New Hairstyles

### Premium Bonus Changes

- Great Bubbly Pet Coupon
- Great Yomi Pet Coupon
- Great Girini Pet Coupon
- Great Petite Invoke Pet Coupon
- Great Kailum Pet Coupon
- Divine White Tiger Mount Coupon
- 100% Titlebook Box II
- Shadow Effect (30 Days) Coupon
- Item Drug (+100) (x5)
- EXP Potion (+1000) (x3)

### Instance Dungeon Difficulty Changes

- [Aurora Garden] Hard difficulty has been added.
- [Aurora Garden] Ant Queen has been changed to a normal monster type.
- [Aurora Garden] The HP of the summoned monster when normal monsters are killed has been changed to match the normal monsters.
- [Monster Tree Valley] Monsters' HP and attacks have been reduced.
- [Sky Coliseum] Hard mode monsters' HP has been reduced significantly.
- [Mysterious Hall] Hard mode monsters' HP excluding Minerva has been reduced significantly.
- [Mysterious Hall] Minervaâ€™s HP in Easy and Normal mode has been increased.

### Dungeon Reward Changes

- All mini-boss and final rewards in dungeons above level 200 have been doubled. (Except for Sky Coliseum)
- The materials earned from the repeatable quests from the following dungeons have been increased.
    - Chamber of Hell
    - Dragon Valley
    - Divine Tree: Rapier
    - Magic Training Center
    - Magic Academy Headquarters
    - Fallout Shelter
    - Dream Oneiro
    - Void Star
    - Oblivion Lake

### Obtainable Item Changes

- Obtainable items from [Monster Tower] have been changed.
    - Equipment will no longer be dropped.
    - Titlebooks are available through daily quests.
    - Daily quests can be obtained from [NPC Allen] at the Monster Tower Lobby.

### Crafting and Upgrade Difficulty Changes

- The difficulty of crafting and upgrading the following items has been modified.
    -
